AUKUS


Header finished: March 2nd 2024 19:17
To be published: March 8th, 2024

Rethought: The reasoning for invading Iraq has wider multifaceted regional basis and goes deeper than the misguided effort to remove a security threat or the blatant pursuit of an opportunistic war to solidify hegemony.

The Western Civilization starts with Greek democracy of the privileged many, moves to the republic of the powerful few and goes to the more free vassage of the chosen noble. The non-violent and universal Christianity played a critical role in moderating the feudal rights and its subsequent relaxation added a resource perspective to the subsequent Western expansion.

AUKUS is a security partnership between the USA, UK and Australia. The three constituent countries of AUKUS descended from Great Britain, which developed the fastest among the Western nations. Its geography acted as both a protective barrier and as an incentive to have a more moderated, trade oriented outlook on warfare.
